title: [Large-Scale] Science Learning Design Expertise Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Online course fostering learning design capabilities through student-led project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can execute science projects from the design phase to outcome derivation using a student-centered approach.
Learners can collaborate with peers and instructional designers to develop science learning activities that reflect educational contexts and goals.
Learners can critically evaluate scientific inquiry processes and instructional design expertise through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
